tour.title: Welcome to asyncz
tour.content: This quick tour will show you how to make the most of asyncz, your AI-powered scheduling platform.

tour.title: Main Navigation
tour.content: Use the header to access key areas of asyncz and explore its smart scheduling tools.

tour.title: Dashboard
tour.content: Track activity, review insights, and manage your account from the asyncz dashboard.

tour.title: Calendar
tour.content: Schedule, edit, and organize meetings or events with the AI-assisted calendar.

tour.title: Workspaces
tour.content: Manage your teams, branches, or different workspaces in one place.

tour.title: Users
tour.content: Invite and manage users, assign roles, and give experts the right permissions.

tour.title: Services
tour.content: Define and organize the services you provide through asyncz for easier booking.

tour.title: Customers
tour.content: View, edit, and keep track of your customers and their bookings.

tour.title: Blacklist
tour.content: Restrict unwanted users or block bookings from here.

tour.title: Subscription
tour.content: Review your subscription plan, billing, and upgrade whenever needed.

tour.title: Feedback & Support
tour.content: Send feedback or contact support to help improve asyncz for everyone.

tour.title: Replay Tour
tour.content: Click this button anytime to restart the asyncz walkthrough.
